channel.title: Delta Green: Divergence (Campaign Concept & Scenario)
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog I look at my process for creating my recent twelve session Delta Green series using *The Fall of Delta Green*: foes, themes, etc and present my rough scenario sketch for the first mission the team handled.
**You can find that here:** https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/delta-green-divergence-campaign-concept-scenario
**The Keeper for the game:** https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Vg6vi3_5q8VeqRSHswhwbifzrRe0dDvjZ5xZQui8bXk/edit#gid=502885382 **AP Playlist:** https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUKV1MEOXoTWDGqoZxv7tK5X69lYwdert

item.title: Delta Green: Divergence (Campaign Concept & Scenario)
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

As one of the players in this series it is fascinating to see behind the curtain. Thanks for investing so much time and effort in the prep, Lowell.

Read full topic
